We are the children of Konda Yesu and his wife, Maryammagar. We are brothers and sisters.
We have the property in Pallakadiyam village, Kanavaram suburb, Rajanagaram mandal, as per the schedule below, which is the property of our deceased father, i.e. our mother, Mariamma, and the Panchayat is paying taxes etc. in her name as Assessment No. 66, and she enjoys the bungalow and the house with all rights for her life. On 1-1-2022, the date of death of the deceased, her husband also died, and we, their main heirs, have inherited the residential land, the bungalow and the bungalow house, the vacant residential land formed by completely removing the said bungalow and the bungalow and razing it to the ground, the land, water, treasury deposits, common roads, common water customs, leasehold rights, etc., and the immovable property, common money, and we are joint beneficiaries and enjoy all rights to this day. In order to jointly enjoy the above mentioned movable and immovable assets and to develop the assets to which each of us has a share, in the presence of our family elders and well-wishers, we have divided the said movable and immovable assets into two shares A and B, and as shown in the schedule below, “A” share is Rs. 3,86,000/- (fixed assets Rs. 86,000/- + cash Rs. 3,00,000/-) worth of immovable assets and joint cash is given to the 1st of us, Konda Sattibabu, and “B” share is Rs. 6,01,000/- worth of immovable property, which is the property of the second of us, Konda, and accordingly, the property which has come into possession of them, along with all rights, shall be taken over by them immediately. Therefore, from now on, without any connection with any other person, either with the debts of one or the immovable property, the property which has come into possession of them, as mentioned in the schedule below, shall be enjoyed by them, their sons, grandsons, descendants 1 K. Sathi baby
2 K.Veeri baby

The future of these shares

Scanned with OKEN ScannerANI
1-3
--
It is agreed that these shares shall be fixed and that neither of us shall make any reductions in the future, whether there be any increases or decreases, or whether there be any redistributions.
None of us have ever, without the knowledge of the other, ever made any mortgages, sales, purchase agreements, bank mortgages, shares, leases, deposit of title deeds, etc., in relation to this immovable property, and this property has not been assigned under Government Act No. 9/77. We hereby declare that no other heirs or beneficiaries other than ourselves are entitled to this deed of probate. We hereby declare that the deed of sale of this immovable property shall be registered in the name of each of the parties to the deed. We have no other property to share. Accordingly, we shall register two copies and take the one in whose name the deed is endorsed. Declaration 1) We hereby declare that there are no trees or gardens like coconut, mango, sweet potato etc., fish ponds, granite mines, minerals etc. in this property and that we shall be liable for the payment of depreciation tax if any such factual details are found to have been concealed. 2) We hereby declare that the property described in this deed belongs to us alone and that we have not previously made any encroachments on the same and that we shall be liable to the punishments mentioned in Section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908, if we are found to have violated the provisions of Section 22B of the Registration Act, 1908. 1 K. sections.content: The property acquired by Konda Veeri Babu by virtue of Partition Deed No. 109 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, being the Schedule-B measuring an extent of 200.18 Sq. Yds., bearing Dismantled House No. 3-291, comprised in survey number 371-1, situated in Kanavaram Shivaru Pallakadiyam Village and Grama Panchayath, Rajanagaram Mandall, within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office I.Polavaram (419) is bounded as follows: North by: 43 Ft., A-Share Property South by: 43 Ft., House Of Rokkala Vinodhkumar East by: 41.10 Ft., House Of Kollari Durgaprasad West by: 41.10 Ft., Road. Note: It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e., the Schedule-B property of the Partition Deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
